summary: the idea that tony brushes off people “smarter” than him is hilarious  like, i’m sorry, are we talking about the same tony stark...
body:
the idea that tony brushes off people “smarter” than him is hilarious 

like, i’m sorry, are we talking about the same tony stark i know? the one who:

  • listened to a young CHILD’S idea and praised him for it, saying “that’s a good idea, actually, i might do that”
  • said the the plan was for a WOMAN’s invention to leave his own inventions in the fucking dust
  • complimented bruce banner’s intellect and said that his work was “unparalleled”
  • called pepper the most capable person he knows

lmao y’all need to watch the fucking movies first, please and thank you

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

blog.name: uppercuts-and-undercuts
blog.title: Uppercuts and Undercuts
blog.description: I love Tony Stark, Harry Hart, and I'm a human disaster.

summary: How’s it going, you fucking legend? I write stuff, and read way more stuff. Firmly stuck in the Hartwin trashcan, and also a...
body:
How’s it going, you fucking legend? I write stuff, and read way more stuff. Firmly stuck in the Hartwin trashcan, and also a hopeless Tony Stark stan. Also, Harry Hart can get it. Thirst posts about both of them are highly likely, even if only in the form of reblogging.

Huge Marvel fan, but only know a significant amount about the MCU (I’m too much of a broke bitch for a comic book collection, you get me?) so therefore I’m not a fan of Steve, Natasha, or Clint. The MCU has fucked with a lot of good shit, because I loved Natasha at first, and was generally positive about Steve and Clint. Then they were ruined by the writers. :/

Kingsman TGC was forgettable for me, which I’m again attributing to the writing. TSS was absolutely brilliant, I can’t begin to tell you how much I loved it. Need my own Harry Hart, because damn.

Talk to me, prompt me, whatever you like. I’m shy and a little weird, but I’m friendly!

And check out my previous works, if you like: https://archiveofourown.org/users/RueLawliet

blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

summary: Turf
title: Turf
body:
Iron Man #176

‘I feel as though I’ve just participated in something momentous. But I have no idea what.’

  • Deliberately vague superheroics. Somewhat unsatisfying.
  • Script doesn’t explain much as Rhodey gets caught up in some epic/ancient battle.
  • The b-story shows Tony making friends with a homeless man on the streets.
  • Fine. Not very exciting.
  • Denny O'Neil (18 of 49).
  • Luke McDonnell (15 of 37). 

6/10

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Off Season
title: Off Season
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OgZRXV

by debwalsh

Sam, with the help of the Avengers, convinces Steve to take a vacation. He agrees to stay in a small touristy seaport town in the off season. There he finds the owner of the local restaurant and discovers that he definitely has a type - tall, dark-haired, and feisty. And in this century, the fact that the object of his desire is another man is really nobody’s business but his own.

Written for haspel for Fandom Trumps Hate 2019, to benefit The Trevor Project.

Thanks for your support of a great cause, and your wonderful prompt!

Words: 7551, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Captain America (Movies), Captain America - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Rebecca Barnes Proctor
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Post-Serum Steve Rogers, Modern Bucky Barnes, Shrunkyclunks, Meet-Cute, Fluff, Steve Rogers has game, Fandom Trumps Hate


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OgZRXV

summary: from ash and dust
title: from ash and dust
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HxxRP5

by halfwheeze

When Iron Man comes back from the ashes, it is with all of the fire of a phoenix and none of the humble beginnings.

In which Tony Stark rebuilds himself with a little bit of help, and he only picks up the parts that burn.

summary:
Tony: *wakes up tied to a chair* Oh, ffs...
Tony: Alright, so which one were you after? Tony Stark or Iron Man?
Villain of the...
body:
Tony: *wakes up tied to a chair* Oh, ffs...
Tony: Alright, so which one were you after? Tony Stark or Iron Man?
Villain of the week: What-?
Tony: When I get out of here, I need to know if I'm blowing up your credit rating or your base.

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: After All This Time
title: After All This Time
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TPkvUX

by baloobird

It took Peter longer to die than the others. Tony knows that. It only makes sense that he would take longer to reappear.

But he didn’t take this long to disappear.

And Tony is getting impatient, damn it.

Words: 2169, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Fluff, Light Angst, Platonic Cuddling, Father-Son Relationship, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Protective Tony Stark, Avengers 4 speculation, Spider-Man: FFH Speculation, theory, Reunion Hug


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TPkvUX
